item.title: Hope for the Future
item.description: National Review Institute helps keep Buckley’s ideas alive for the next generation.

item.title: 2024’s Biggest Loser Was Barack Obama
item.description: From 2024's vantage point, is there any way to look at Barack Obama's legacy but as a tragic blight on American history?

item.title: Judges deny sentencing delay for Bob Menendez's corruption crimes
item.description: A federal judge on Monday rejected former Sen. Robert Menendez's bid to delay his sentencing for bribery, extortion and other crimes of corruption.

item.title: We Need a Full Accounting of Biden’s Presidential Incapacity
item.description: There must be severe consequences for the concerted effort to suppress the public’s knowledge of Biden’s cognitive deficits.

item.title: Contrary To Media Claims, Deporting Illegal Alien Criminals Will Save Taxpayers More Than It Costs
item.description: Immigration advocacy organizations are out to create shock-value numbers that overestimate the real costs of deportation.

item.title: Farewell, President Stimulus
item.description: The disastrous political consequences of Biden’s stimulus-law failures may prove to be his most enduring legacy.

item.title: What Elon And Vivek Get Wrong About H-1B Immigration And American Exceptionalism
item.description: If the election didn’t make this clear, I’ll state it as plainly as possible: We want less immigration. That includes H-1B workers.

item.title: Ukraine receives US natural gas shipment for the 1st time amid fresh supply fears
item.description: The expiration of Russian piped gas through Ukraine has put EU leaders on edge, sparking fresh supply concerns ahead of a cold winter season.

item.title: Higher Education Leaders Finally Start To Realize Their Entire Industry Is Worthless
item.description: An article in higher education's flagship magazine is more evidence that academia is starting to recognize it needs to change.

item.title: Don’t Pause the TikTok Ban to Wait for Trump
item.description: We have one president at a time. Congress is right to ban TikTok without waiting for Donald Trump to cut a deal.
